programme.title: Secret Confession
programme.desc: In-man is a timid but caring man who creates a suicide group for his first night and suggests a 'bucket list'.

programme.title: Fantasy
programme.desc: Chan-soo, in a vegetative state for 3 years, hears everything but remains trapped in time, unable to move.

programme.title: Best Friend
programme.desc: Dae-kwon is a NIS agent specializing in wiretapping. On the verge of demotion, he receives an order from Mr. Kim, his senior: surveilling a well-known politician and his family in house arrest. That politician, Lee Eui-min, is the opposition party's frontrunner for the next presidency. Disguising as next-door neighbors, Dae-kwon and his team must find evidence to stop him from running.

programme.title: Big Match (Squid Game's Lee Jung-jae)
programme.desc: Choi Ik-ho is a baseball player turned a WFC fighter after getting banned from the baseball league over an assault charge. He is enormously talented in fighting and soon becomes a superstar in the WFC. However, one day the police come to find him and tell him that Young-ho, his brother and manager who had gone missing, has been arrested as a prime suspect for a murder of a man who had visited Young-ho to suggest a game for Ik-ho.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: An adopted pastor reunites with his shaman brother and together, they search for their mother with dementia.

programme.title: Two Faces of My Girlfriend
programme.desc: Gu-chang falls in love with a charming girl, but her violent alter ego reveals she has multiple personalities.

programme.title: Summer Snow
programme.desc: To protect your loved ones, these three words are enough: 'I'm sorry, I love you, thank you.'

programme.title: The Battle: Roar to Victory
programme.desc: Over a 4 day period, a fierce battle takes place between Korean independence militias and imperialist Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: A con artist and her daughter target a rich family’s hidden treasure—but the heist takes unexpected turns.

programme.title: SWITCH
programme.desc: Top celeb Kang wakes up in a new life: married to first love with twins—while his ex-manager is now the star!

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: Left alone at the age of 17, Woo-min, enters into cruel world to protect his late father’s caregiver, Su-jung.

programme.title: Wet Dream
programme.desc: Jin-hee, scarred by loss and loneliness, finds healing and true love with a man who cherishes her selflessly.
